xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Wiki Manager Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Various translations that are used in the wiki template and, implicitly, in the created wiki.
## MENU ### Missing: core.menu.type.wiki=Wiki ### Missing: core.menu.watchlist.add.wiki=Watch Wiki ### Missing: core.menu.watchlist.remove.wiki=Unwatch Wiki ### Missing: core.menu.admin.wiki=Administer wiki
# WIKI INFORMATION PANEL ### Missing: platform.wiki.panel.title=Wiki information
# MESSAGES ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.welcome=Welcome to the {0}{1}{2} wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsOwner=You are the owner of this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsAdmin=You are an administrator of this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinNeedToLogin=To join this wiki, you need to be logged in. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserNotMember=You are not a member of this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentuserCanJoin=If you like, you can {0}join this wiki{1}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsMember=You are a member of this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserCanLeave=If you like, you can {0}leave this wiki{1}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.gadgetTopActiveUsersAllMembers=To see the full list of wiki members, see {0}User Directory{1}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationPendingForCurrentWiki=You have been invited to join this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestPendingForCurrentWiki=You have requested to join this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestAcceptedNotification=Your request to join the wiki ''{0}'' has been accepted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestRejectedNotification=Your request to join the wiki ''{0}'' has been rejected. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateHandledSaveComment=Handled candidate {0} ({1}) platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateHandledComment=Comentariu platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateAcceptedSuccess=Cerere acceptată cu succes platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateRejectedSuccess=Cerere respinsă cu succes ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteUserAlreadyMember={0} is already a member of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteRequestAlreadyExists={0} already has a pending request. Please respond to that request instead. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteUserAlreadyInvited={0} already has a pending invitation. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteSaveComment=User ''{0}'' has been invited to join the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteNotification=You have been invited to join the wiki ''{0}''. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteSuccess={0} invited successfully. platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelSaveComment=Invitație anulată platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelNotification=Invitația dumneavoastră a fost anulată si nu mai este validă platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelSuccess=Invitație anulată cu succes platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelFailure=Eroare, nu puteți anula această invitație platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateReviewFailure=Eroare, nu puteți anula această invitație
